    • getUsers

      public static List<User> getUsers(token token) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Here an admin can get all the Users of the database.
      Parameters:
      token - Admin has to be logged in to be validated
      Returns:
      List of all Users of the database
      Throws:
      IOException - - Occurs if in the client.send or in the mapper.readValue command an error arises
      InterruptedException - - Occurs if in the client.send a thread has been interrupted

      public static String newUser(User user) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Here a new User is created on the database.
      Parameters:
      user - User to be created
      Returns:
      A String with the return message. Says whether the User could be created or not.
      Throws:

      InterruptedException - - Occurs if in the client.send a thread has been interrupted

    • changeUser

      public static String changeUser(token token, User user) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Here a User can change its account data. By passing a new User object with the new account data.
      Parameters:
      token - User has to be logged in to be validated
      user - New account data
      Returns:
      A String with the return message. Says whether the User could be changed or not.
      Throws:
      IOException - - Occurs if in the client.send or in the mapper.readValue command an error arises
      InterruptedException - - Occurs if in the client.send a thread has been interrupted

    • deleteUser

      public static String deleteUser(token token, User user) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Deletes User in the Database.
      Parameters:
      token - User has to be logged in to be validated
      user - User Object that should be deleted in the database
      Throws:
      IOException - - Occurs if in the client.send or in the mapper.readValue command an error arises
      InterruptedException - - Occurs if in the client.send a thread has been interrupted
